definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

to build up public opinion/to create a fuss

sentences.english: Last term I took part in a geography research study group.
sentences.chinese: 上学期，我参加了地舆小组的研究性学习。

sentences.english: The photographer put the graph in the paragraph on geographicing geometry.
sentences.chinese: 摄影师将图表插到论述地舆几何学的段落。

sentences.english: The  rebels labeled the labor laboring in the  laboratory and  lavatory.
sentences.chinese: 反叛者给在实验室和舆洗室劳动的劳工贴上标签。

sentences.english: As far as Jieyu's experience is concerned, you are blind and deaf.
sentences.chinese: 在接舆的经验层面上，你就是个瞎子，就是聋子。

sentences.english: The work of the Holy Spirit in personal experience cannot be disengaged from Scripture.
sentences.chinese: 圣灵在个人的经历的工作是不能舆圣经分割的。

sentences.english: Every flatterer lives at the expense of those who listen to him.
sentences.chinese: 阿舆奉承的人是靠听信谗言的人活命的。

sentences.english: He is very familiar with the geographical features of this district.
sentences.chinese: 他对这一地域的地舆特性很熟习。

sentences.english: The counselors are those who had specialized technology while were lower in social position.
sentences.chinese: “舆人”是拥有一种专门技术而社会地位低下的人。

sentences.english: StopWatch is an application that functions like a real stopwatch.
sentences.chinese: 秒表是一个原理和功能舆真正的秒表相同的实用程序。

definition: ancient vehicle made of wood and bamboo/CL:輛|辆[liang4]
to give in to/to be swayed by (personal considerations etc)/Taiwan pr. [xun2]/to follow/to expose publicly/variant of 侚[xun4]/variant of 殉[xun4]
capital of the Jin State during the Spring and Autumn Period (770-475 BC)
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
